name: Sunshrine
description:
Sunshrine is a 2D platform fighter for up to 4 players locally. Unlike other games in the genre, here you don`t need to eliminate your enemies, but you need to charge all the power before the others. Use items, charge in the right time, and be the winner!

The game is set in a cyberpunk, Cosmic J-Horror theme and a pixel art aesthetics.

Créditos

  • Antonio Barbosa - Programmer and shalow now
  • Cristiane Jade - Product Owner
  • Davi Nery - Game Designer
  • João Paulo Xavier - Programmer
  • Mateus Melo - Sound Designer
  • Rodrigo Nascimento - 2D Artist

GDD Link: http://bit.ly/GDDsunshrine
